mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carte de la Suisse, avec des noms en marge = Karate von der Schweiz, mit Randnamen / gezeichnet und herausgegeben von Heinrich Keller im Zürich untere Zäune No. 367, 1850
Karte von der Schweiz mit Randnahmen
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Keller, Heinrich, 1778-1862 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map : col. ; 25 x 42 cm. with surrounding text on sheet 34 x 53 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Names of major cities in colored boxes in lateral margins. [original]
Detailed legend in upper left corner of map. [original]

Possibly the map that appeared in: Nouvel itinéraire portatif de Suisse / d'après Ebel et les sources les plus récentes. ; Orné d'une belle carte routière de Keller ... 2. éd. Paris : H. Langlois, 1850. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: "The gift of Bernard Shipp" stamped on verso and "Gift May 30 '35" stamped in left margin; pencilled notes in both lateral margins. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Switzerland--Maps
Switzerland--Maps, Tourist
